comments.body: `on` is a quite generic term. From a cursory look it doesn't appear to be a reserved keyword in neither Java nor Scala, so I guess it's unlikely to be an issue, but I would consider dropping it or replacing it. `com.daml.ledger.sql` seems equally telling.
That is fair; happy to rename this along with renaming the Bazel package at a later point (after we decide as a group).
